item.title: Facebook Fabric Networking Deconstructed
item.description: Facebook engineering has recently introduced their next-generation data center network architecture planned to be operational in the new Altoona facility. Introducing data center fabric, the next-generation Facebook data center network In this post we are going to look at the design proposed and break down some of the reasons why this design was necessary although maybe still not ideal. Facebook, the killer app.. literally Within Facebook’s data center the network is a critical component driving this social networks ever increasing appetite to connect people together.
